imdb.plot outline: Your Sport celebrates the personal and community benefits of grassroots sport and the power of community sport. It focuses on the positive impact that sport makes across the UK and beyond, and featuring celebrities and initiatives that use sport for good as well as a range of unusual sports.
imdb.title: Your Sport
plot: _Your Sport_ (qv) celebrates the personal and community benefits of grassroots sport and the power of community sport. It focuses on the positive impact that sport makes across the UK and beyond, and featuring celebrities and initiatives that use sport for good as well as a range of unusual sports.
